title: Jared Kushner's Dad Offends With Ethics Groups Comments
content: Real estate developer Charles Kushner is the father of President Donald Trump's top White House aide and son-in-law Jared. He said in an interview that ethics watchdogs 'assure that poor, not successful people' get government jobs instead of 'rich, smart, successful people.' Charles's comments were published Friday. They came in an interview with The Real Deal at his self-named company's headquarters.
